title: February’s PS Plus lineup is STACKED - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.15.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Imran Khan joins Tim to talk about an exciting month for PlayStation Plus, a fun crossover bewteen PowerWash Simulator and Final Fantasy 7, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:59 - Housekeeping
  - A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now breaking down the Xbox characters we love the most! Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
  - A new Kinda Feudy poll is up right now on Blessing’s Twitter.
      - https://twitter.com/BlessingJr/status/1625206493955096577 
  - The Roper Report   -
00:02:56 - Horizon Forbidden West comes to PS Plus Extra in February
00:20:41 - PowerWash Simulator’s FF7 pack lets you clean up Midgar
00:29:11 - MultiVersus’ daily peak Steam player count has dropped more than 99% since launch
00:40:34 - Atomic Heart Composer Mick Gordon is Donating His Fee in Support of Ukraine
00:43:11 - Game Freak says it’s ‘very important’ to continue making non-Pokémon games
00:46:06 - God of War: Ragnarok Devs Didn't Realize That Allies Spoiling Puzzles Would Annoy Players
00:49:52 - Saudi Arabia reportedly increases Nintendo stake for second time in a month
00:53:51 - Out today
00:55:33 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim

We're here to talk about video game news!
